!The drunken fool Boris: Burp. The royal Guards of the Lord? Yeah. They were royal Guards once. The Lord's gold? Of course the stories are true. I heard it all when I was a sentry at the Lord's camp. But I am too thirsty to talk now. *The finest Malukian wine* will do nicely... This wine is only available from the Dark Elves! I heard that the *Dark Elf trader named 'Tyra' * has a stock of it...
